en.sc1: Now, for the implementation of pop. We will use the remove method of the ArrayList.
en.sc2: Since the stack is not empty, we proceed. If the stack were empty, we would throw a EmptyStackException.
en.sc3: We call remove with the index of the top element. Since we treat the end of the ArrayList as the top of the stack, we use size() - 1.
en.sc4: Note that we return the removed element. This is the element that was on the top of the stack. Because we are removing from the end of the ArrayList, the cost is $O(1)$.
